document.full_text: britain called for a reduction of 50 percent of greenhouse gas emissions by 2025, but a top official said the commitment would be reviewed in 2014 and perhaps loosened.
document.title: britain sets strict targets for greenhouse gas emissions
lines_and_colors: britain called for a reduction of 50 percent of greenhouse gas emissions by 2025, but a top official said the commitment would be reviewed in 2014 and perhaps loosened.
